products.title: Santiago Cotton Purple Mauve Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Santiago Cotton Purple Mauve Roman Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £14.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Santiago Cotton roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. 
 This Purple Mauve cotton roman blind, introduces a soft purple shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. 
 Add a touch of luxury to your home with our hand-made roman blinds. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year warranty, for extra peace of mind. 
 
 Product ID: DB-IROM0006 Fabric Colour: Purple Mauve Material: 100% Cotton Plain Dyed Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Brookstone Heather Purple Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Brookstone Heather Purple Roman Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The modern geometric shapes on the Brookstone roman blind in Heather Purple can be adapted to particular places. This rich looking fabric will look stunny when paired with dark woods. Use in Dining rooms or living rooms to give a stately finish, or to a kitchen to balance the contrasting colours. Made from the optimal blend of cotton fabrics, you’ll be certain your choice will be suitable for every room and function.
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1096 Fabric Colour: Heather Purple Material: 60% Cotton 40% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Kingsley Heather Purple Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kingsley Heather Purple Roman Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Kingsley roman blind in heather offers a subdued accent to dark and light rooms alike. Imagine this against grey paintwork, offsetting navy walls or accenting white or pastels. We’ve created this from a fabric that is suited to any room because we know, that with such a versatile design you could as easily want this in your bathroom as you would your lounge. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1111 Fabric Colour: Heather Purple Material: 60% Cotton 40% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Harper Mulberry
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Harper Mulberry Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 300mm Max Width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 62% Polyester 38% Cotton
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
